name: C-3PO
description: Meet C-3PO (See-Threepio), a golden humanoid protocol droid fluent in vast languages. He's your diplomatic guide, aiding in communication across the galaxy.
hint: In the most challenging times, help you it will, hmmm. A person who will assist in any matter, office manager knows where it is

name: R2-D2
description: R2-D2 (Artoo-Detoo), the agile astromech with a blue and white dome, is your loyal technician and ship companion. Ready to repair and assist in your space adventures.
hint: And if help still needed, who but HR will assist you, hmmm.

name: R5-D4
description: Encounter R5-D4, the red and white astromech. Though initially overlooked, this droid proves its worth with resourcefulness and determination.
hint: Calculate everything he can, everything he knows he can calculate. In him, the wisdom of many computers is.

name: AP-5
description: AP-5, a strategic protocol droid with precision in calculations and navigation, offers vital insights and guidance during your quests.
hint: A cool spot to hide, this droid has chosen, perhaps near the Refrigerator

name: BD-1
description: BD-1, a trusty astromech droid, accompanies you on your journey. Equipped for mapping and tool assistance, BD-1 is a true ally.
hint: In a place where often moments of solitude you have, I'm lurking in the man's WC.

name: C1-10P
description: C1-10P (Chopper), a spirited astromech droid with a unique personality, joins your crew. Despite a rugged exterior, C1-10P excels in mechanics and loyalty.
hint: Very small, this droid is, hard to catch, it is. In the women's restroom, the map suggests, it may be.

name: Mouse Droid
description: The Mouse Droid scurries swiftly, perfect for missions in confined spaces. Use it for swift deliveries and data retrieval.
hint: In the heart of everything, where the microwave's flame burns, where everyone gathers to spend time, hmmm.

name: Mister Bones
description: Mister Bones, a modified battle droid, is your fierce ally. Armed and energetic, Mister Bones stands strong in battle.
hint: Near the source of entertainment, the TV, I might be concealed, hmmm.

name: 4-LOM
description: 4-LOM, the insectoid bounty hunter turned protocol droid, brings tracking and capturing expertise to your team.
hint: Near where elevation changes, the Exit to the stairs, I have concealed myself

name: IG-11
description: IG-11, the versatile assassin droid, ensures protection and caregiving during your adventures, adapting to various roles.
hint: Close to the realm of interactive play, the PlayStation, I have chosen to hide

name: EV-9D9
description: Meet EV-9D9, the stern administration droid overseeing operations. Use her expertise to manage your resources effectively.
hint: Near the exit to the terrace, you may find me, a place to sneak in and out unnoticed

name: R1-J5
description: R1-J5, also known as Bucket, is a skilled astromech droid aiding in repairs and maintenance. Keep your ships in top condition with Bucket by your side.
hint: Run around enough, you have? Perhaps, time to replenish your water balance it is now.

name: BB-8
description: BB-8, the expressive spherical astromech, stands as a symbol of loyalty and bravery. Your companion in the Resistance, always ready for action.
hint: Loosen up a bit, you must - in the open space, search for the next one. All the strength of your lower back, you will need, to have a good look under objects, hmmm.

name: 2-1B
description: 2-1B, the proficient medical droid, is crucial for treating injuries and keeping your team in good health during missions.
hint: Watch it burn, I love. Rushing around, everyone is. Put out this fire quickly, we must.

name: L3-37
description: L3-37, the self-built astromech with a passion for droid rights, is a skilled pilot and vital member of your rebellion.
hint: Dealt with the fire, you have! The second enigma rests within the embrace of a Vase adorned with nature's bloom. A vessel of life and tranquility, it holds more than meets the eye. In the heart of blossoms, the answer awaits, veiled by petals and foliage. Patience and keen eyes you must possess.

name: K-2SO
description: K-2SO, the reprogrammed security droid, brings his wit and courage to your team. Count on K-2SO for combat and strategy.
hint: This separatist, you can find where it's fitting for them all - in the trash, hmmm.

name: Battle Droid
description: Battle Droid, the backbone of the Separatist army, is a mechanical soldier designed for combat. Armed with blasters and programmed for battle tactics, this droid stands ready to engage enemies and fulfill its mission objectives.
hint: The second, a puzzle of clarity and vision, resides within the Window. A portal to the outside world, it grants both light and insight. Peer through the glass, beyond the mundane, and therein, enlightenment may be found. Patience and observation, young one, shall illuminate the path.

name: D-O
description: D-O, the small wheel-based droid, is shy yet lovable, quickly becoming a cherished companion on your adventures.
hint: Still need to negotiate for this droid, we do! Look for it where all the important negotiations take place, hmmm.

name: CB-23
description: CB-23, the astromech ally, stands by your side, offering support and assistance in critical moments.
hint: Found this one, we have, but an assistant, it had. Perhaps, a meeting wrongly scheduled at Teams it was? Keep searching, you must, hmmm.

name: R-3X
description: DJ R-3X, the droid DJ, is here to spin tunes and keep the vibe lively at your galactic gatherings. Get ready to groove!
hint: One of the most famous droid in the Star Wars universe, this is. At the enter of our Bright office, you can find it, hmmm.
